definition: Gounod (name)/Charles Gounod (1818-1893), French musician and opera composer

sentences.english: Faustus, the opera, is one of the most famous works of Gounod.
sentences.chinese: 歌劇《浮士德》是古諾最著名的作品之一。

sentences.english: Obtaining the Cournot equilibrium profit is the ideal result to the duopoly enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 獲取古諾均衡利潤是兩企業長期博弈的理想結果。

sentences.english: Unwittingly, Cournot had stumbled across an example of a Nash equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 有意無意之間，古諾發現了一個納什均衡的例子。
